title: Agbe
author: Agbe
content: What a wonderful Christmas gift to the Nigerians in the forum. Congratulations to we all. Nigerians have been asking Sir theymos to create a local board for them. And Nigerian wake up today being 21/12/2022 to see the Christmas surprised from BIG Â UNCLE theymos. I thank all efforts made by Nigerians to make this dream reality. Finally Nigerian board is created https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=275.0 or https://bitcointalk.org/index.php . Once again congratulations. Sir theymos thanks you very much your good heart to hear your children cry and give them what they ask. May God bless you and long long life. Happy Christmas to All Forum users. Please join the Nigerian brothers and sisters to celebrate this awesome achievement.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.created_time: December 21, 2022, 07:30:25 AMLast edit: December 21, 2022, 08:46:20 AM by Rikafip
comments.body: Congratulations fellow Nigerians, local board well deserved! If I am not mistaken, this is the first local board added since 2017 which makes it even bigger accomplishment.As I've kept saying for some time now, if you keep your local topic active and clean of spam, sooner or later you will get what your own local board, and finally that day has come. I have no doubts that your activity will Â increase even more now, as it will be much easier to have quality discussions now when everything won't be cramped up in one thread.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Welcoming fellow Nigerian to the forum, and wishing you-all a wonderful Christmas season. I hope to see continued success for your board in the future and I hope the board will be a good platform to encourage more Nigerians to participate on the forum. Congrats!

comments.body: Congratulation to all Nigerians!!!We are fighting the for the same too... https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5430735.0We are same in many ways for exmaple - we have almost similar population 211m vs 225m- fighting and facing the similar crises - We also have corrupt politician, corrupt institutions and most of all out of control inflation.I hope bitcoin can help us to fight this inflation.

comments.author: skarais
comments.body: It was really great, and in the end you all got it.
